name: blog
description: Node app to allow users to save info about interesting blogs they find

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../part2/phonebook && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../part3/phonebook_pt2/
scripts.deploy: cd ../.. && git subtree push --prefix part3/phonebook_pt2 heroku main
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: Lauren Piontek
